complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down GitHub API integration into core components: authentication, CRUD operations, type definitions, error handling, and rate limiting strategies
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Extremely complex task involving multiple sophisticated aspects of API integration. Requires deep understanding of GitHub API, robust TypeScript typing, comprehensive error handling, and performance considerations with rate limiting. Multiple integration points, complex type definitions, and need for extensive testing make this a high-complexity architectural foundation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose field mapping into status conversion, priority mapping, description enrichment, and subtask handling strategies
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to semantic preservation requirements across different task management systems. Involves intricate transformation logic, handling multiple mapping scenarios, preserving metadata, and supporting different subtask representation modes. Requires careful design to maintain data integrity and meaningful translations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Design state management components: file structure, atomic operations, change detection, performance optimization, and recovery mechanisms
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex task involving persistent state tracking, concurrent access handling, and high-performance requirements. Needs robust file management, efficient lookup mechanisms, and sophisticated change detection. Potential for race conditions and performance bottlenecks increases complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down one-way sync into issue creation, issue updating, subtask handling, labeling strategy, and batch processing implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple synchronization scenarios, subtask representation challenges, dependency tracking, and batch processing requirements. Needs to handle various task states, create meaningful GitHub issue representations, and manage large-scale synchronization efficiently.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Design conflict detection strategies, resolution mechanisms, interactive prompts, auto-resolution rules, and undo functionality
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Extremely complex task involving intricate conflict detection across multiple fields, interactive resolution mechanisms, and sophisticated decision-making algorithms. Requires careful design to handle ambiguous scenarios, provide clear user guidance, and maintain data integrity during synchronization.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Two-Way Sync with Conflict Handling
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Design bidirectional sync components: change detection, remote pull mechanism, local update strategy, conflict routing, and partial failure handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to bidirectional synchronization challenges, timestamp-based change detection, conflict resolution routing, and maintaining data consistency. Requires robust error handling and careful management of partial sync scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose advanced GitHub feature integration into milestone management, project board synchronization, and assignee mapping
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderately complex task involving integration with multiple GitHub enterprise features. Requires understanding of different API endpoints, handling feature flags, and supporting various GitHub deployment scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Design configuration components: token validation, repository selection, preference management, and secure storage mechanisms
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving secure configuration management, API token validation, and interactive setup. Requires careful handling of sensitive information and providing clear user guidance.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement CLI Commands and User Interface
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down CLI implementation into command definition, option handling, progress tracking, error messaging, and user feedback mechanisms
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderately complex task requiring comprehensive CLI design, clear user interaction patterns, and robust error handling. Needs to integrate with existing task-master CLI architecture and provide intuitive sync management interfaces.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Design domain facade extension with GitHub sync methods, error handling strategies, and backward compatibility considerations
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving careful integration of new GitHub sync methods into existing domain architecture. Requires maintaining existing functionality while adding new synchronization capabilities with clean, extensible design.
